attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern:

My husband and I are not in favor of the proposed increase in the filing fees,
especially those that are associated with international adoption. We are already
going to have to re-file the documents because of the increased waiting time
associated with international adoption. This means we are currently paying double
the intended amount. If any changes should be considered to the current process,
especially those associated with adoption, it should be to increase the time the
filed documents are valid because 12 months is NOT long enough and does not
correspond with the current wait time on many international adoptions. Many
families that are adopting internationally are already spending a considerable
amount of money and the increase of the filing fees would only cause more of a
hindrance in this already difficult process. Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Mr. and Mrs. Hembree

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
